amendment.description: To authorize and strengthen the tsunami detection, forecast, warning, research, and mitigation program of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5126 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5126 proposed by Senator Sullivan for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 5125.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5126 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5126 proposed by Senator Sullivan for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 5125.
